website_summaries.verdict: This toothpaste contains a powerful formula and protects enamel from acidic food and drinks.
pros: Offers a formula that provides advanced brightening and polishes teeth for a whiter, brighter smile
Delivers the right amount of minerals to strengthen enamel
Includes specific ingredients that remove stains and polish enamel
cons: More expensive than many comparable options
Toothpaste has a chalky texture and taste

website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a whitening toothpaste that works for most stains while also protecting teeth, this popular toothpaste has a lot to offer.
pros: Distances itself from others on our list for its triple-action properties – removes and prevents stains while protecting sensitive teeth by helping to strengthen enamel
Consumers rave about the creamy consistency, clean feeling, and minty flavor
cons: Users with tough, set-in stains may see mixed results or require longer use before a noticeable difference

customer_reviews.title: Actual bright & white teeth can be yours
customer_reviews.text: Listen up people. I've always been that person who has sought after that crazy white smile that you see in toothpaste commercials. Years of using whitening toothpaste, kits, strips, floss and what have you later, my teeth became naturally 'white'. I got complimented on them all the time. But, I was still waiting for them to be that blinding bright white. I have no idea what is in this toothpaste, but it makes your teeth REALLY white. And I know it's this specific toothpaste because I have been using Sensodyne true white for a long and didn't notice a difference. I have been recommending this left right and center. Get this and you will absolutely be swimming in compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Avie

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Love using this toothpaste after my dentist recommended it when i told him i had tooth sensitivity. It really works because i dont have sensitivity anymore in the spot in question.
customer_reviews.author: Herman L.

customer_reviews.title: What's inside that great big box?
customer_reviews.text: Love the toothpaste! It just seems you could save money on shipping to us Prime members if you'd pack things in more size appropriate boxes and mailers. I've been recycling some pretty big boxes for tiny items that would easily fit in a mailer.... just sayin'
customer_reviews.author: Shoppergirl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, gentle toothpaste!
customer_reviews.text: I really really like this product and did not realize how different another Sensodyne Pronamel product that I recently ordered from Amazon would be since the same ingredients are listed on the back but the new stuff does not leave my mouth feeling as fresh as this product does. Will be returning the new stuff so that I can reorder this one again and again! Great product for sensitive teeth and/or if you have been drinking coffee for the past 40 years like I have :-)
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste works well if you need to control sensitivity. I would give it five stars for that. The problem was that my hygienist asked what I’m doing differently because she has never seen my teeth look so poorly brushed. I’m a meticulous brusher and always have been. The only change was from Colgate Total sensitive to Sensodyne Pronamel. I guess I will keep the pronamel for especially sensitive times but go back to Colgate for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: dbest57

customer_reviews.title: very small
customer_reviews.text: I used to get this at costco so 4 huge ones for about 23 dollars so I decided to try it here. It turned out the listing on here was only less than half the size therefore, it is very expensive. The size is about twice the travel toothpaste size. 3 oz is very small. Costco size is about 7 oz. This tastes exactly like other pronamel series, personally i do not find a different taste in all formulas. I will probably not purchase this again. Not economical.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelearn

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly to whiten and help sensitivity!
customer_reviews.text: My teeth are noticeably whiter and not as sensitive as they were before using. I’ve been using this toothpaste for about two weeks and I’m getting compliments on my “sparkling white teeth”. I love this toothpaste!
customer_reviews.author: Willa

customer_reviews.title: Small tube, no whitening functional ingredients in it
customer_reviews.text: I have even using this brand for a while and tried different function tooth paste. So far this one is not my favorite. no ingredients in the toothpastes indicates it’s whitening function. So don’t pay money on that. It is very small tube and more expensive than buying in Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Chen

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brand of toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Sensodyne makes a great toothpaste that I've been using for years, taste is fine for toothpaste. But it keeps my teeth from becoming overly sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wowww my sensitivity is gone after ONEEEE use! And it was extremely sensitive. Thanks so much!! Update: Literrrrraaalllllly the sensitivity is completely gone the pain is gone I’m so amazed after one brush it was wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Brittanee

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: My dentist recommended that I use this toothpaste due to my sensitivity. I will buy again so I can see if it's working. I'll update my review after that.
customer_reviews.author: Tha Book Slayer

customer_reviews.title: Help prevent my teeth soreness but
customer_reviews.text: It does help a lot on my teeth soreness and that’s the main reason I bought it. But the whitening part is not very effective and the volume is a little disappointing for this price. I feel half of the tube is empty.
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: Taste isn’t for me.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t get past the flavor. It’s so strong & nauseating. Not for me apparently because most seem to love it. Maybe just a preference but I’m not sure. It was like putting an actual mint leaf in my mouth, just not appealing for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Try it, you’ll be amazed at what it can do
customer_reviews.text: Been using Sensodyne for over 5 years and it works great! Haven’t had any issues with my teeth and dentist gives me two thumbs up after my checkups.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I brought it for very cheap. I know for that kind of money the tooth paste won't be like the regular size. However, it is still smaller than i would expect. It is a good tooth paste though. Not a huge visible difference, but i think it is getting a little bit whiter than before.Maybe i'll get the full size next time instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ohamazon

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing, Refreshing, enamel helping, and sensitivity healing toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: What a refreshing feel your mouth and teeth have after brushing. Knowing I am helping fight the day to day acid on my teeth is a great benefit. After using whitening strips, I soon learned if I brush my teeth first with this toothpaste, I avoid the sensitivity that often comes.
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: This toothpaste gave me canker sores!!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product when I got it and I noticed after a few days of using it I started developing canker sores in my mouth. I thought that the canker sores were just from something I was eating but it turns out it was this toothpaste. For several weeks I had terrible canker sores in my mouth, they were so painful I couldn't eat sometimes. As soon as I stopped using this toothpaste my mouth has not had any signs of canker sores or irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it for a few days, but I can already tell a difference in how clean my teeth feel after brushing. I can really feel the bristles going to work. Two minutes of brushing seemed like such a long time at first, but I’m starting to get used to it. It made me realize that I probably wasn’t dedicating enough time or effort to brushing my teeth even though I was flossing more regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Watson

customer_reviews.title: Good, non-abrasive toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: I haven't seen any noticeable whitening with this, hence the 4 star. I like the Pronamel line and bought this because it was cheaper than my usual Pronamel, non-whitening toothpaste, and like it just as well. The flavor is good, nice consistency, and leaves you with fresh breath
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: What you see is NOT what you get.
customer_reviews.text: The photo shows 3oz tube. They actually sent a .8 oz travel size. Hmmm? But, the toothpaste is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Hed

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't value for money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because my friend recommend it to me. Firstly, when I received this, the size is too small. Compared to the same price, I could but a larger size toothpaste for other brands. Secondly, the whitening effect is not clear. Other toothpaste could also have the same effect.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Toothpaste, Accurate Listing
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the best value for the money. Sensodyne toothpaste is so expensive! I like the flavor of this one and that it protects enamel along with whitening. I would definitely recommend. I've already placed a second order for refills.
customer_reviews.author: Dess

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I have sensitive teeth and I like ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have sensitive teeth and I like that this product addresses the sensitivity issue but also does some whitening.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Tiny tube! I have sensitive teeth but I enjoy keeping my teeth pearly white, this is the best of both worlds. Yes you can get stuff that will whiten harder and faster, but if sensitivity doesn’t allow you to then this is your toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Christine creedon

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: It depend what is your teeth condition. The advertising of this product is whitening. It will work if your teeth have color. If your teeth is fairly white, then it is not gonna make more white. Btw, it’s small pack.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste was recommended to me from my dentist. I had a receding gum which caused some sensitivity. This worked WONDERS! I have continued using this toothpaste and have had no further issues with any sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonprimista

customer_reviews.title: Small size!
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered this for the first time. I didn't realize that it's not a full size tube. However, it's not a bad deal for a travel size tube of Sensodyne, so I'll use for travel. I won't buy it again though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good value
customer_reviews.text: I used to purchase the 4pack ones from Costco around $20. Wanted to try this one instead but it’s very small - probably half the size. And the flavor is not as refreshing as the old one.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I am at the age where sometime the enamel from our teeth gets thin in certain areas. This toothpaste works for me to lessen the sensitivity in those areas. I use daily with each brushing. Whiten as well.

customer_reviews.text: I love this toothpaste after my dentist recommended it since I had tooth sensitivity last week. It really works because i dont have sensitivity anymore in 3-4 day after using day and night.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do as advertised on TV
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it twice a day for about a month. Absolutely no difference in color. Just a regular toothpaste

customer_reviews.title: Cost is not worth it for the size
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years, make sure you read the product details first. The size of the tube is not big at all for the price. I was just trying to follow the stay at home orders and do shopping online.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: This is so yummy. It does have a milky flavor? Weird but I totally taste like it should have milk but it doesn’t look like it. Taste good though!
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Great toothpaste!
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste is amazing for sensitive teeth. I've struggled with sensitive teeth ever since I had an eating disorder, and I would recommend this product over any for sensitive teeth. Not only is it very gentle, but it helps restore your enamel and strengthens it. Plus, it leaves my breath feeling very fresh and with a pleasant taste in my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No help with sensitive teeth
customer_reviews.text: This product does not help with my sensitive teeth. I only feel a slight bit of protection. My teeth do hurt at times brushing with this toothpaste. I will go back to my old product.

customer_reviews.title: Work for sensitive teeth
customer_reviews.text: First off the package is damaged. The price isn’t cheap and it’s very small. I don’t see a whitening result but it does work for sensitive teeth

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and actively cleansing
customer_reviews.text: I've tried Colgate and by far, Sensodyne is the best brand for sensitive teeth. Since this one was on sale, I decided to try this one. It comes with the fresh flavor and so far for the last 2 days of use, I feel like it's doing its job and my teeth feel cleaner. Best of all, even after eating grapes, my teeth don't feel as sensitive as using the regular Colgate toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Fong

customer_reviews.title: not good not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not much bubbling, mainly because the amount is too small, it is not as cost-effective as costco, do not think it is worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: It's just toothpaste, but a really good one.
customer_reviews.text: I've always used this brand and loving it. It feels much more cleaner, healthier and fresher than any other brand I've used in the past.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I have this set to auto reorder. I have been using Sensodyne tooth paste for 5 years. Works great.

customer_reviews.title: Loved!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously helped my sensitive teeth! I would buy again if the tubes weren't so small for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Best toothpaste protect and whiten.

customer_reviews.title: Always Repurchase toothpaste brand!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my family have been used this toothpaste for long time! Always love it! It reduces the problem of sensitive teeth and gum. One of the best toothpaste ever!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed hygiene products are ridiculous

product_meta.title: Sensodyne Pronamel Strong and Bright Enamel Toothpaste for Sensitive Teeth, to Reharden and Strengthen Enamel, Extra Fresh - 3 Ounces
product_meta.description:
Sensodyne Pronamel Strong and Bright Enamel Toothpaste for Sensitive Teeth strengthens your enamel and polishes away stains for whiter, brighter teeth. This sensitive enamel toothpaste's dual action formula contains teeth whitening sensitive ingredients that are gentle on acid-weakened teeth. Delivering minerals to strengthen enamel, this acid erosion toothpaste helps prevent and remove tooth stains as it protects your enamel from damage caused by exposure to acidic foods. With stannous fluoride as its active ingredient, Sensodyne Pronamel Strong and Bright toothpaste aids in the prevention of dental cavities and protects your teeth from acid wear, building lasting protection against painful sensitivity to cold, heat, acids, sweets or contact. This anticavity toothpaste conveniently comes in a travel size tube within TSA requirements. For fresh breath and healthy teeth, brush for two minutes, twice daily. With Pronamel, your teeth can look and feel their best.

Satisfaction Guarantee

If for any reason you are not satisfied with any GSK Consumer Healthcare product, GSK Consumer Healthcare will provide you with a reimbursement within 45 days of the date of purchase. Please note that because GSK is unable to control the quality of our products sold by unauthorized sellers, the Guarantee is not available for products purchased from unauthorized sellers due to potential quality issues outside GSK’s control. Please contact GSK Consumer Healthcare directly for more information.
feature_bullets: One 3 oz tube of Extra Fresh Sensodyne Pronamel Strong and Bright Enamel Toothpaste for Sensitive Teeth, to Reharden and Strengthen Enamel
Strong enamel toothpaste that protects you from the effects of acid erosion while whitening your teeth
Sensitivity toothpaste that protects your teeth from pain triggers, making this whitening sensitive toothpaste an effective choice for sensitivity protection and relief
Anticavity toothpaste with fluoride to improve enamel health and prevent cavities
Dual-action formula helps remineralize and whiten acid-weakened teeth, preventing enamel damage
Sensodyne Pronamel Extra Fresh toothpaste effectively cleans and helps keep gums healthy
Brush for two minutes, twice daily
